title: /note
body:
hello 

i have a question for you . do somebody  now what /note does i don't now it . already thx

replies.body:
Using the /note feature while in a game will add whatever you say to a text file called MyNotes which you should be able to find at this location:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.180
